title: ICAI CA Intermediate Paper 5 (Auditing & Ethics) Exam Rescheduled to January 19, 2026
content:
# ICAI CA Intermediate Paper 5 (Auditing & Ethics) Exam Rescheduled to January 19, 2026

Ek important update hai! The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) ne CA Intermediate Paper 5 (Auditing & Ethics) exam ki date reschedule ki hai. This fast update is crucial for all students appearing for the upcoming examinations.

Here are the key details:

*   **Original Exam Date:** January 15, 2026 (Thursday).
*   **Rescheduled Exam Date:** January 19, 2026 (Monday).
*   **Reason for Reschedule:** The change is due to the general election of Municipal Corporations in the State of Maharashtra scheduled for January 15, 2026.
*   **Applicability:** This rescheduling applies to all examination centres across India and abroad.
*   **Other Exams:** Please note that the schedule for all other examinations notified earlier (vide Important Announcement No. 13-CA (EXAM)/JANUARY/2026 dated September 23, 2025) remains unchanged.
*   **Admit Cards:** Admit cards already issued will remain valid for the rescheduled date.
*   **Timings & Centres:** The examination timings (2 PM to 5 PM IST) and centres will remain the same.

## Read the Official Document
